title: Strengthening E-Learning Practical Competencies: Embodied-Based Optical Experiment Simulation Learning Course

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can perform light refraction experiment simulations using hand gestures in a VR environment with 85% accuracy.
Learners can reconstruct theoretical principles of optical phenomena into at least three verbal explanations through embodied learning activities.
Learners can explain the process of adjusting experimental variables through gesture-based interactions with peers in collaborative simulations with over 90% accuracy.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
